Simulation - Class in algorithm
Simulation: encapsulates a map or network of roads that have traffic and other properties, and simulates the motion or flow of traffic based on a set of pre-defined rules.
Simulation(int, int, int, int, Rules) - Constructor for class algorithm.Simulation
Simulation class constructor initializes the private instance variables for a new simulation.
